ygData.subject: RE: [RE: [eqbards] Need assistance please  ]
ygData.msgSnippet: ... It s not cheating.  You re just introducing a rather young mage to something that will become a fact of life in his 30s and 40s - if he lets his pet get
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 13 Apr 2000, Bill Costlow wrote:
> --- kim@... wrote:
>
> > I would kick in
> > Accel, wait
> > for him to order his pet to attack me, then quickly
> > drag the
> > pet out of command range and through a bunch of
> > hostile mobs
>
> Heh, I can see it now: "The bard is cheating!" Just
> remember, running like the gingerbread man is what we
> do best;-)

It's not cheating. You're just introducing a rather young
mage to something that will become a fact of life in his 30s
and 40s - if he lets his pet get out of command range, it will
bring back a train. :)

> > pet roots you...
>
> If the pet roots you and you are singing Selo's you
> can usually break root the next round...

I'm fairly certain the root icon stays up, so the moment you
drop Accel, you're rooted.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
